name: Santa Saves Christmas (Virtually Games)
description:
Description

Santa Saves Christmas is a fun, light-hearted and FREE SHMUP / scrolling shooter. Krampus has stolen Santa's presents and wrapped some of his own in red wrapping paper. The aim of the game is to shoot down these red "presents" and collect the green presents by controlling Santa.

Features

- Download for FREE!

- Aim to beat your high score with every playthrough by controlling Santa

- Fun SHMUP / scrolling shooter action!

- 2 collectable powerups

- Christmas themed

If you enjoy the game please consider downloading for Windows/MAC/Linux or on the Google Play Store (all links below)
